query:
UPDATE tasks
         SET
            title = COALESCE($3, title),
            markdown = COALESCE($4, markdown),
            due_date = COALESCE($5, due_date),
            assignee = CASE 
            WHEN $6 = true THEN NULL
            ELSE COALESCE($7, assignee)
            END
         WHERE id = $1 AND (assignee = $2 OR created_by = $2)
